1. Introduction¶

This introduction will show how to use and extend vcsSHARK. Furthermore, we list all requirements for this tool here, so that an easy installation is possible.

1.1. Requirements¶

There are several requirements for vcsSHARK:

  • Python3+ (only tested with python 3.5.0)
  • Mongoengine (0.10.5) - available here: http://mongoengine.org/
  • Pygit2 (0.23.2) - available here: http://www.pygit2.org/
  • Pymongo (3.2) - available here: https://api.mongodb.org/python/current/

Note

It may be possible, that vcsSHARK also works with other versions of the named libraries. But we only tested the versions, which are given in brackets.
